website_summaries.verdict: Extremely portable, this oven is the perfect size for tailgating, camping, and picnics.
pros: Measures 18.6"L x 18"W x 15.5"H. Reaches cooking temperatures of 700°F
Cooks a pizza in 5 min., and is then immediately ready to cook another
Dual-layer, interlocking cordierite pizza stone with a heat-diffusing hollow core ensures an evenly baked crust
cons: Heat escapes out the vent, which makes for uneven cooking between top and bottom of pizza

customer_reviews.title: It takes a little trial and practice
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing. It took a few tries to get it right. But once you get it down you can make great pizzas in no time. We had a party last weekend and made 20 pizzas in no time. It took longer for people to figure out what kind of pizza they wanted then to cook them. I would say 5 to 7 min each. Best pizza no doubt. We are having another one this weekend but only 7 or 8 pizzas. If you're going to have a party make dough balls ahead and keep them in refrigerator. Have all the toppings ready. Roll out the dough and go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale D. Hoffart

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been trying to make pizza at home for some time and it was not going well. We purchased this unit and it works great. I think the key is that this unit gets much hotter that our stove or our outdoor bbq. Only downside with the unit that we have seen is that the crumbs fall through onto our deck (lots of crumbs due to using corn meal to make pizza slide easily). I fear that I will be seeing a lot of pizza for the next couple of months as my wife tries to master different types of pizza - oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Deck or Tailgating!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to have one of these after using one that a coworker had. This thing is amazing, it heats up quickly and cooks the pizzas fairly quick, My only complaint is that the mesh screen to prevent the pizza sliding off the back doesn't come with it.... Otherwise this is a solid product and the tall legs makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: VaShadow

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s starting to rust and it’s never seen water as it’s always covered in the BBQ area. It cooks fast but it doesn’t retain any heat. I wish it retained more heat in the top...I created a lid that covers the top ventilation area and with that it has never gone above 600. The bottom of the pizza starts to get burned as the pizza stones do get incredibly hot - then you have to lower the temp to MED but then the top area temperature drops.
customer_reviews.author: KBH

customer_reviews.title: Much better than oven
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, it makes pretty good crusty pizza for a propane pizza oven. The pizza it makes is slightly better than the one made on a stone in the oven but not as good as a wood oven pizza.. I like that now I can cook outside and have no smell in the house. Mine never gets hotter than 700f. The Outside temp is around 45-50f.
customer_reviews.author: Granik

customer_reviews.title: Fun family and friends activity
customer_reviews.text: We love our pizza oven! Reading reviews has helped us avoid some of the problems others have experienced. Read the reviews! If your home oven has a proof option for dough, I highly recommend using it, it has taken the dough to a new level. We don’t make our pizza dough, we buy it at Whole Foods and bring it home and proof it before cooking. I also suggest having at least 2-4 pizza peels so you can keep the pizzas coming without too much time in between. Fresh mozzarella, although delicious, can make a watery pizza, better to use a drier mozzarella. The oven is really great and in 5-6 minutes your pizza is ready.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie b

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Love
customer_reviews.text: perfectly portable. easy to assemble. easy to use. great heat makes for a great crust. I own 2 of these and use for parties. pizza is ready in 5 minutes. only thing better is a wood fired built-in brick oven. dreaming about that! until that happens, love these!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was able bake flat bread in minutes once oven reached 700 degrees. Oven hit 850 even with outside temperature around 40 degrees Fahrenheit at around the 35 minute mark. Picture shows one of my first experiments. A little underbaked on the top, but that was my fault, not the oven's.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Orlow

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you love pizza.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Best money I’ve spent. The pizza comes out amazing, such a good flavor to it vs baking in your oven. I was skeptical after reading the reviews, but it’s amazing. Just keep in mind the temp outside and wind etc will affect the timing when cooking your pizza. We use this oven weekly.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: We really like the pizza
customer_reviews.text: Loving this pizza oven. It takes a little time to figure out what temp works for you. We really like the pizza, it's every bit if not better than restaurant pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Pizzacraft oven
customer_reviews.text: FREAKING LOVE THIS THING!!!! I don't think we will ever buy pizza again!!! this oven gets super hot!!! super fast!!! makes pizza supper yummy!!! super fast!!! 1 can have 4 pizzas made in 15 min. but you do have to watch the pizza really close because it can burn fast!!kids love making their own pizza. I love the fact I get to see and have total control of the ingredients going into the pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've tried on several different occasions and either it burns the dough or my pizza comes out raw. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: 800 degrees!!
customer_reviews.text: Oven is amazing! My first time using the Pronto. I used it in 38 degrees and the stone reached a temperature of 650 degrees and the ambiant temperature was 800! . The pizza took less than 5 minutes to cook. I recommend using tipo 00 flour at these temperatures for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very much lots of fun, We love it
customer_reviews.text: The little cooker that could! Very much lots of fun, We love it. Works perfectly as advertised. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: The stone stained very easily when the crust started to brown. Overall not bad. A bit hard to use at first. Need a learning curve
customer_reviews.author: Tracikaye

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: Bought the is for my husband for Xmas and we have used it twice already. So easy, fast and fun! It’s the gift that keeps on giving!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani C.

customer_reviews.title: First use and operation GREAT
customer_reviews.text: So far this unit is great. Only used it once but it worked just as advertised and we love making our own pizzas and how fast this makes them. Did not take long to put together and was able to use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: BAG

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza oven! We have been using it for several months now and we love it! Buying the stand was well worth it! Best purchase in a while for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice oven
customer_reviews.text: Nice oven.. hard to turn pizza while cooking.. works great once you get used of it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive, simple to use and makes great pizza
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of reviewing prior to buying this oven. We are very happy and been cranking out the pizza, to the enjoyment of friends and family. This oven is inexpensive, simple to use and makes great pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Thorp

customer_reviews.title: Makes great pizzas and fast
customer_reviews.text: Makes great pizzas and fast. Absolutely love this pizza oven. Have used it 3 times in the first week of having it
customer_reviews.author: Megan Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use affordable & fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun easy to use oven. Perfect for your first step into the world of Romana & Neapolitan style pizza at home. I recommend the leg extensions. They work great and the heavy propane tank sits right in the middle of them and stabilizes the oven nicely.
customer_reviews.author: whitefish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  Pizza ovan
customer_reviews.text: Great ovan , easy to use , after 10min you can start to use and the Pizza is ready after 4-5 minutes , after 25min from piwer up Pizza is ready after 2min . My kids love it and the Pizza is ausome
customer_reviews.author: dror elka

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If u want fresh pizza, this is it! Works great on pizza & flatbread. Experimenting w/dough recipes now But it heats quick & hot. Turn halfway for best results. Don't go too far! Cooks quickly. Best to slightly pre-cook raw dough before topping. So much better than take-out or frozen. Sauce first, then cheese then a few toppings. Don't overload. Yum!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kwags25

customer_reviews.title: Makes excellent pizza
customer_reviews.text: Makes excellent pizza and was very surprised by how easy it was. The design makes inserting and rotating pizza difficult. Opening is tight, but must have to be to keep temp up.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Bummed used it 2 times and bottom stone is cracked😞 pizza we’re awesone but how do I fix this!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Killian

customer_reviews.title: Makes pizza equivalent to a professional restaurant oven
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but good luck with this oven. I have had so many people over for pizza that I bought a second one to keep up with the demand for hot pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Honea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Love making pizza's on this. It was my father's day gift this year.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the Pizzeria Pronto, it’s easy to use and assemble. It reach more than 700 degrees so that the pizza really gets the crunchy touch.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Romero

customer_reviews.title: Been a great addition to our family's outdoor BBQing
customer_reviews.text: Been a great addition to our family's outdoor BBQing. Very fun and fast. Makes a fun outing and a new flare on summer outdoor eating
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Pinnock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughters pizza party. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mark Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizza
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for just about anyone. Very portable and I take it to all our Tailgate games.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Not good results
customer_reviews.text: Uneven heating, with Burnt results in back and under heating in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: like the sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: like the sturdy construction...A few reviews mentioned a learning curve I had no such experience my pizzas came out perfect from the start. I can tell this oven will be around for years. There is nothing flimsy about this product it is well made...My Daddy always went over grade in the materials he used to build things ...this reminds me of that.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R DeLaO

customer_reviews.title: easy setup, rapid heatup and impressive pizzas
customer_reviews.text: easy setup, rapid heatup and impressive pizzas! A "green" alternative to heating my electric ovens for an hour to get the pizza steel hot.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes pizza great every time . We love it 🍕
customer_reviews.author: carrie stringer

customer_reviews.title: Great oven!
customer_reviews.text: We bought your pizza oven several months ago and love it. This purchase is a gift for our son and his wife, who have shared pizza from our oven.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent .... pizza comes out fast and just like a pizza parlor ... 2 min assembly
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Emielita Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy. The pizza that came out of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but I felt I had to after using this product yesterday. I've been making pizza for a while and using techniques I've learned from the pizza bible. The one thing I was lacking was an oven. As you know they can be quite costly. I decided to pull the trigger on this one day and when I received it I immediately put it together and fired it up. Super easy. The pizza that came out of this was amazing. So delicious. Temperature gets up to 700 and it cooks in less than 3-4 min. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: sent to our Aunt in Florida as a thank you gift for coming to visit. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pizza!!
customer_reviews.text: This pizza oven is the best! Heats up quickly and makes excellent pizza!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Can do three pizzas in under ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Its so convenient and the pizzas come out amazing! Was a bit expensive but was totally worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a fathers day gift...was a huge hit!! Its so convenient and the pizzas come out amazing! Was a bit expensive but was totally worth the money after the amount of times we've used. We buy the 99 cent pizza doughs at Krogers and away we go with fresh pizzas in no time flat!! You definitely need the pizza peel tho...otherwise theres no way of getting your pizza out when its done
customer_reviews.author: Polly Diaj

customer_reviews.title: Love this pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza oven. Got it for Christmas and had pizza for lunch. Set up was quick and easy, and the pizza was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B Vourlitis

customer_reviews.title: Great way to cook pizza
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza oven. We use it probably once a week. There are only 2 slight issues that I have noticed. 1. It takes longer then the 10 minutes stated to pre-heat. 2. If there is any wind it takes even longer and doesn't seem to be able to maintain a constant temp. I expected this to be a bit of a problem, since there is no way to cover the opening. I am going to try to build some sorta wind screen to mitigate the problem. All in all, this is an excellent piece of equipment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shane McBreen

customer_reviews.title: Makes good pizza
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful starting up the first time! There is no way of knowing if it starts up without feeling the heat. I started mine the first time and thought it was lit. Came back 5 min later and noticed it was not hot. It took three times turning the knob click click click. Gas had built up and exploded at my face and arm when it did finally light. Could have been very seriously burned! My husband who does not cook ended up making a pizza while I iced my face. It turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome,I am what some people call a pizza snob.don't like chain pizza shops.I grew up on the east coast where you could go and buy a slice,I have used this a least 7 times since getting it.It works awesome,nice crust melts cheese perfectly,gets plenty hot.
customer_reviews.author: David Bray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A little but of a learning curve, need practice!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Love it, pizza cooked fast and perfectly done
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised, Love it, pizza cooked fast and perfectly done. Small enough to store easily and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Makes better pizzas then any pizza delivery
customer_reviews.text: Got this pizza oven a couple weeks ago. Makes perfect pizzas. I would recommend this product to anyone who enjoys "real" italian pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Vanreko

customer_reviews.title: I make pizza better than any local pizzaria
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! I make pizza better than any local pizzaria. I would suggest making Neapolitan dough for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Colavito

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza
customer_reviews.text: I was using pizza stones in the oven before purchasing the outdoor pizza oven. While they worked great, this just seems to work better and even my guests noticed the difference. I live in NH and winters are cold, when I last used it was 10 degrees outside and the oven started right up and performed great. I Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Pizza...Good...
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to assemble and easy to operate. Heats up very quickly, and it's more fun to make a pizza in the back yard than we would have thought. Our attempts at rolling out our own dough have met with...shall we say...mixed results, but we'll overcome the learning curve. Makes great crispy pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great little pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, with a little practice.. The pizza comes out well.... I like it more 'well done'. Than other people, So I just make my own... I would recommend !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam M. Czepiel

customer_reviews.title: Test the Starter!
customer_reviews.text: Received it and got it assembled. Tested the starter (with gas) and it did not work (no spark). Immediately returned it as I did not want the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that the top doesn't have a handle to lift ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a peel that Amazon stated 'most people who bought this bought that' and the peel is 6 inches wider then the opening of the oven. Disappointed that the top doesn't have a handle to lift to put in the pizza. The opening is so small it is difficult to place the pizza on the stone. Really not please at all especially since I bought this for a family reunion party and waited until last minute to take it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product
customer_reviews.text: The Pizzacraft Pronto Outdoor pizza oven was easy to put together. Only a few parts required a screwdriver. It hooked up to my propane tank and started right up. I rolled the dough out on a pizzacraft mat and used the pizzacraft peel. Both were terrific. After 5 minutes in the oven I had some of the best crust ever..and perfectly cooked through.
customer_reviews.author: nora fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Oven arrived and looks great. Problem is it doesn't start. Shipping back.
customer_reviews.author: MarkC

customer_reviews.title: My first effort was a calzone and it turned out perfect. My only wish was the space between the ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this it was a warm and breezy summer afternoon. The oven got to temperature in 10-15 minutes. My first effort was a calzone and it turned out perfect. My only wish was the space between the pizza stone and the top of the oven was an inch deeper. When the calzone rose it dragged against the thermometer when I pulled it out.
customer_reviews.author: David Conover

customer_reviews.title: great for pizza fresh or frozen!
customer_reviews.text: Works great heats up to 700 degrees! Also works with frozen pizza. NOTE: throw away that red plastic top cover if you accidentally leave it on like I did it will MELT !!! don't even chance it just throw it out and use foil or a metal top to cover the top holes when not in use. I do not know why on earth they would ship a plastic top like that...
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I now own two (one is at my shanty in the woods), and convinced two family members to get one. While it does take some trial and error to make good pizza it is not the fault of the oven. I haven't tried flat breads but Foccacia is on the list. Tons of fun for parties, just prep the dough and set out ingredients, the kids and everyone can experiment and share. A big secret is that a 14" cast iron wok fits perfectly if you remove the pizza stones! Flaming wok stir fry? Oh...yes.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: second oven in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This is the second oven I've purchased in 2 years. The 1st one lasted a year and was awesome. Then the regulator stopped working and a pitiful flame shot out and blackened everything. I was so impressed by the oven, I bought another, but after 2 uses, same thing. It's after 30 days and I cant return. Stay away! Update! Called tech support and they told me a spider must have laid a nest by burners, and Lo and behold, there it was. Cleaned it out and now it works fine. Great pizza oven. Just wish I’d called tech support before buying new one!
customer_reviews.author: Pennylane3

customer_reviews.title: A STEAL for the price! I LOVE this oven. I saw on at Sur La Table and it was twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a steal for the price! Turns out excellent pizzas! I had to glue the rubber feet into place, but other than that this has been an incredible purchase! I've only used it at home but it is so much fun to cook pizzas outside. This would be easy to bring camping or to a tailgate. AWESOME product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but requires fair amount of practice to get consistent results.
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of baking pizza once it reaches temperature of 700 F. However oven requires about twenty minutes to reach temperature, not the ten given by the manufacturer. As it is very sensitive to the environment your experience may vary. One caution: The Ceramic surface easily over heats. So, it is best to turn down the heat if the next pizza isn’t ready to go in immediately after removing the one in oven.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Could be ha hazardous.
customer_reviews.text: Defective gas inlet valve, customer service nonexistent. Poorly engineered by amateurs. .
customer_reviews.author: ROGER GAFNER

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, such good pizza. We use it every weekend and very happy with it. We did get the stand as well, and glad for the extra height and safety. We were making pizzas in the regular oven previously, and that just didn't get it hot enough to make good crust, baked toppings, or charred bottom. This does it all. We are also gluten free, so getting dough to cook the way you want is usually a challenge. This makes it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to vacuum away after the oven cools and ...
customer_reviews.text: It really does bake pizza in about 6~ 7 minutes. Need to make few batches of pizza dough ahead of time so I can bake pizza back-to-back. The oven is more than capable of doing that. Extra toppings that fall off the pizza while sliding in/out turns to black coal-like thing. Easy enough to vacuum away after the oven cools and able to remove oven stones and cover.
customer_reviews.author: YY

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and has given good service!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to get this oven, and I’m sorry that it’s no more available. If you can get one, do so! A worthy purchase. Heats quickly and evenly, nice pizzas produced, and it will go along well on our trailer trips but also give great service out on our deck. A nice little oven!
customer_reviews.author: J Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Took a little time to figure out but now get excellent results
customer_reviews.text: Had to experiment a bit to get the dough and procedure down pat but am now turning out artisan pizza that rivals wood ovens. Would definitely recommend also ordering the legs as well as the stainless steel pizza peel Makes it alot easier to get the raw pizza into the oven.
customer_reviews.author: DianeB

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Pizza Maker
customer_reviews.text: After just a couple initial tries we got the hang of making a servable pizza. Lots of fun. The extension ring is a must for ease of use in getting the pizza in and out of the pizza oven. Would definitely buy it again. This review made me hungry, think I'll make a pizza.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: get it when there is a warehouse deal
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a warehouse deal. Since it was from warehouse, I got it for a much better price. I'd say it was worth it but I wouldn't pay full retail. I got this because it takes too long for my big green egg to get fired up. This is much more "faster". If I'm doing more than just a 1 or 2, I would skip this and just use my egg.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Wong

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this along with the leg kit. We’re still learning how to make the pizzas we prefer. But this oven is letting us do that. We love how it’s able to create so much heat in such a small package. Customer support is awesome, also.
customer_reviews.author: RVwino

customer_reviews.title: Great product but it takes some practice to master getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it takes some practice to master getting the pizza in and out of the oven. It's definitely worth the time it takes to learn how to use it properly. It perfectly replicates A real brick oven flavor in the pizza
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN LARMORE

customer_reviews.title: Heat level
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven but the oven does not heat above 500 degrees. It did the first two days of use. I hope it doesn't lose any more heat. I saw that several others have the same issue on reviews. I would give it three starts but since it only heats to the minimum heat required to bake pizza after a few uses it isn't worth 200 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jen in Fl

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza oven! It makes ordinary pizzas taste amazing! My family requests pizza at least once a week now! I strongly recommend buying the stand and pizza paddle to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely awesome! Makes pizzas fast. Ben of a learning curve but once you get the hang of it easy money!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speedy delicious pizzas. Perfect for parties. Each pizza pops out after about 7 minutes done perfectly. Don't walk away though it could over cook the base.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Oven
customer_reviews.text: Loving this oven so far. Heats up fast and cooks pizza in no time. We'll worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ever Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: Wow what an excellent pizza oven. Can’t believe how fast it cooks pizzas. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: William E. Molin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and transport
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and transport, fast cooking, take it to my grandkids every time and they love home made pizzas
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this outdoor pizza maker a lot, only draw back you can only do one individual pizza at a time. Would recommend this oven
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lapenna

customer_reviews.title: so far it has been fun. You have to be diligent with turning the ...
customer_reviews.text: so far it has been fun. You have to be diligent with turning the pizza while it is in the oven or it will burn easily. There is a learning period for using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect until we do
customer_reviews.text: have not built my own brick oven yet. This is perfect until we do. spotted charred crust! great naples pizza
customer_reviews.author: AmorHammer

customer_reviews.title: cooks evenly and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast, cooks evenly and easy to clean. While the stone is 14" it works best with pizzas up to no more than 12".
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. We use it and make about 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. We use it and make about 10 pizzas at a time. This is a product that is well worth the money. Heats up fast cooks evenly and it guaranteed to add pounds!
customer_reviews.author: R. Darby

customer_reviews.title: Delish delish!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love easy to put together/ heats fast/ love it
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: My son ands family love it and use it when they go camping
customer_reviews.text: My son ands family love it and use it when they go camping. Is there a peel that fits it? the standard is too big.
customer_reviews.author: gReview

customer_reviews.title: I had read reviews on William Sonoma and Sur La Table & their ratings were superior. My husband had wanted a pizza oven but
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift for my husband. I had read reviews on William Sonoma and Sur La Table & their ratings were superior. My husband had wanted a pizza oven but, most were in a price range that was unbelievable. I thought it was worth the try for this price and came to Amazon to shop prices. Best prices were on Amazon of course! We love it! It is unbelievable. We have cooked for the 2 of us or for a party of 20. Pizzas cook beautifully in 8 minutes. We will never buy pizza in a restaurant ever again. We can make them 10x’s better!
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: awesome product the entry point if quite small so you ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome product the entry point if quite small so you cannot put too many toppings on your pizza and thin crust seems to help this problem.
customer_reviews.author: chautauqua78

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to purchase this. We gave used it numerous times and it is great! The word dies affect performance but marginally. Once the heat is up it is amazingly quick. I was concerned about the pizza not having a wood fired flavor but I gave received several compliments on the taste of the pizzas. If you are looking for a portable pizza cooker I would highly recommend it. I can put it in my car and head to the park with the family or head to the back yard. I will buy more of these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product and would highly recommend it. I haven't used it yet. But it's a high quality pizza maker.
customer_reviews.author: miriamguate

customer_reviews.title: thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: opening to small makes it difficult to slide pizza in. temp not easily controlled too hot or too cold. definitely not worth the price or the frustration, wish I had never ordered it
customer_reviews.author: charles maas

product_meta.title: Pizzacraft Pizzeria Pronto Portable Outdoor Pizza Oven, Lightweight, Portable & Safe On Any Surface
product_meta.description: Make a day of cooking hand made, brown and crispy pizzas with this Pizzeria Pronto outdoor pizza oven from Pizzacraft. The oven features built in cordierite pizza stone that gives your pizza an even and thorough browning. Also included are a thermometer, matchless starter, gas hose, and standard regulator. The oven is portable, making it ideal for camping, cook outs, and picnics.18-3/5" L x 18" W x 15" H
feature_bullets: Included Components: The Pizzeria Pronto Outdoor Pizza Oven, A Specifically-Designed Cordierite Pizza Stones, Thermometer, Matchless Starter, 48" Gas Hose, And Standard Regulator For Type I Fitting.
